file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 24-20-01-04 - AC STATIC INVERTER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL AC STATIC INVERTER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH AC STATIC INVERTER INSTALLED 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the AC static inverter. B. The AC static inverter is on the left side of fuselage forward section I. C. You can get access to the AC static inverter through access panel 113AZ on the left side of the nose landing-gear wheelwell. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY FOR AIRCRAFT WITH AC STATIC INVERTER 24-20-01-000-801-A AC STATIC INVERTER - REMOVAL INSTALLED FOR AIRCRAFT WITH AC STATIC INVERTER 24-20-01-400-801-A AC STATIC INVERTER - INSTALLATION INSTALLED EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 24-20-01 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 24-20-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH AC STATIC INVERTER INSTALLED 2. AC STATIC INVERTER - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the AC static inverter. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - HYDRAULIC SYSTEM - PRESSURIZATION WITH AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200 EMDP AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200 LG SAFETY PIN - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL S.B.145-32-0036 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 113 113AZ Fuselage forward section I D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Fuselage forward section I I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure that the nose landing-gear safety pin ( AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/ 200) is installed. (2) On aircraft PRE-MOD S.B.145-32-0036, make sure that the pressure in hydraulic system 1 is fully released ( AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 24-20-01 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) On aircraft POST-MOD S.B.145-32-0036, install the safety pin of the NLG door solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). (4) Make sure that the GPU pushbutton, on the electrical panel, on the overhead panel, is set at OFF (The striped bar is off). (5) Attach a DO-NOT-SET-ON tag to the GPU pushbutton. (6) Make sure that the BATT 1 and BATT 2 switches, on the electrical panel, on the overhead panel, are set at OFF. (7) Attach a DO-NOT-SET-AUTO tag to the BATT 1 and BATT 2 switches. (8) Open access panel113AZ (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Disconnect the connector (3) from the AC static inverter (2). (2) Remove the bolts (1) and washers (4). (3) Remove the AC static inverter (2) from the aircraft. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 24-20-01 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH AC STATIC INVERTER INSTALLED AC Static Inverter - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A 1. BOLT (4) 4. WASHER (4) 3. CONNECTOR 2. AC STATIC INVERTER DET. A 145AMM240071.MCE B EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 24-20-01 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 24-20-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH AC STATIC INVERTER INSTALLED 3. AC STATIC INVERTER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to install the AC static inverter. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM TASK 24-20-00-700-801-A/500 AC GENERATION SYSTEM - OPERATIONAL TEST AMM TASK 24-20-01-700-801-A/500 AC STATIC INVERTER FAN - OPERATIONAL TEST SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL S.B.145-32-0036 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 113 113AZ Fuselage forward section I D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Fuselage forward section I I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the AC static inverter (2) in the aircraft. (2) Tighten the bolts (1) and washers (4). (3) Connect the connector (3) to the AC static inverter (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 24-20-01 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the DO-NOT-SET-ON tag from the GPU pushbutton. (2) Remove the DO-NOT-SET-AUTO tag from the BATT 1 and BATT 2 switches. (3) Do the operational test of the AC Static Inverter Fan ( AMM TASK 24-20-01-700-801- A/500). (4) Do the operational test of the AC Generation System ( AMM TASK 24-20-00-700-801- A/500). (5) Close access panel 113AZ (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (6) On aircraft POST-MOD S.B.145-32-0036, remove the safety pin of the NLG door solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 24-20-01 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
